objects.description: Psylo has a command to conduct timestomping by setting a specified file’s timestamps to match those of a system file in the System32 directory.

external_references.description: Falcone, R. and Miller-Osborn, J.. (2016, January 24). Scarlet Mimic: Years-Long Espionage Campaign Targets Minority Activists. Retrieved February 10, 2016.

objects.x_mitre_detection: {{LinkById|S0078}} has a command to conduct timestomping by setting a specified file’s timestamps to match those of a system file in the System32 directory.
